name: Elemental Dragon
description: The Elemental dragon, a type of reptile not many people have researched. Become more powerful as you kill mobs and mine for riches. Gain new skills and become the best you can be. Customise your experiance to your liking. what abilitys lie dorment? What happens if you mix certain abilities? What about water and fire? what will happen? how will they mix? You decide what kind of elemental dragon you want to become.
